org.daisy.pipeline.braille.css

Interface CounterSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, cz.vutbr.web.css.Term<Integer>, cz.vutbr.web.css.TermPair<String,Integer>

    public interface CounterSet
extends cz.vutbr.web.css.TermPair<String,Integer>
    A counter name-value pair. See Manipulating Counters in the braille CSS specification.
